title: FIB SEM Imaging
protocol_description: FIB SEM data was collected using a Crossbeam 540 FIB SEM with Atlas 5 for 3-dimensional tomography acquisition. Images were acquired at 5 nm isotropic resolution throughout each region of interest, using a 10 ms dwell time. The SEM was operated at an accelerating voltage of 1.5 kV with 1 nA current. The EsB detector was used with a grid voltage of 1,200 V. Ion beam milling was performed at an accelerating voltage of 30 kV and current of 700 pA.
imaging_method_name: Focused Ion Beam Scanning Electron Microscopy
